messages.cooldown: You must wait {time} before using /rtp again!
messages.noPermission: You don't have permission to use /rtp!
messages.noWorld: You must be in a world to use this command!
messages.movedCancelled: Teleportation cancelled! You moved too much.
messages.noSafeSpot: Could not find a safe landing spot. Try again!
messages.teleported: Teleported to X: {x}, Y: {y}, Z: {z} ({distance} blocks from spawn)
messages.warning1: WARNING: RTP is in early development!
messages.warning2: May teleport to dangerous locations. Move to cancel.
